title: naDedu bA
sahitya:
naDedu bA nAlvariddeDege ennayyane namma nimma toDga nirNayisi kombenu tOyajAkSa


caraNam 1    Adiyalli enna mattAru ninna pAda sEveya mADi halavu kAla 
sAdhisidarttava sale enna jIvakke AdAravAdudanEke koDalolle
    caraNam 2    sAlava koDa valle sale DhauLiya mADi kAlava kaLeve nI kapaDadinda 
mElAda vibudharu meccuvante ninna kAlige enna koraLa hatta kaTTuva
    caraNam 3    sanakAdi munigaLa sAkSiyindali enna manage bappante nI ghana nambugeyitte 
anumAnavEkinnu pAlisayya Iga vanajAkSa tande shrI purandara viTTala
